SELECT C.CategoryID, MAX(C.CategoryName) AS CategoryName, SUM(case when I.StoreItemID is null then 0 else 1 end) AS FormsCnt FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_store_formscategory C LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_store_forms F ON F.CategoryID = C.CategoryID AND F.IsUse = 'Y'
AND F.FormName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND F.FormPrefix LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_store_items I ON F.StoreItemID =I.StoreItemID
AND I.IsFree = #{filterIsFree}
LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_store_forms_rev R ON R.StoredFormRevID = F.StoredFormRevID WHERE C.IseUse = 'Y' GROUP BY C.CategoryID ORDER BY C.seq

SELECT F.FormPrefix, F.StoredFormID, F.StoredFormRevID, F.FormName, F.FormDescription, C.CategoryID, covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, C.CategoryName) AS CategoryName, I.StoreItemID, I.IsFree, I.Price, F.FormDescription, R.FormHtmlFileID, R.FormJsFileID, R.MobileFormHtmlFileID, R.MobileFormJsFileID, R.ThumbnailFileID, R.RevisionNo, F.PurchasedCnt, CASE WHEN P.StoredFormRevID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS PurchaseYN, P.PurchaseDate, F.MobileFormYN FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_store_forms F INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_store_items I ON F.StoreItemID = I.StoreItemID INNER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_store_formscategory C ON F.CategoryID = C.CategoryID INNER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_store_forms_rev R ON F.StoredFormID = R.StoredFormID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.StoredFormID, A.StoredFormRevID, A.CompanyCode, A.PurchaseDate FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_store_purchase A INNER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_store_forms_rev B ON A.StoredFormRevID = B.StoredFormRevID WHERE A.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} ) P ON F.StoredFormID = P.StoredFormID WHERE R.StoredFormRevID = #{StoredFormRevID}

INSERT INTO covi_approval4j.jwf_store_purchase( CompanyCode, StoredFormRevID, IsFree, IsCoupon, PurchaseDate, RegistDate, RegisterCode ) VALUES ( #{CompanyCode}, #{StoredFormRevID}, #{IsFree}, #{IsCoupon}, NOW(3), NOW(3), #{RegisterCode} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();

INSERT INTO covi_approval4j.jwf_formsschema( SchemaName ,SchemaDesc ,SchemaContext ,DomainID ) SELECT covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, #{FormName}) ,'' ,SchemaContext ,(SELECT DomainID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain sod WHERE DomainCode = #{CompanyCode}) FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_formsschema WHERE SchemaID = ( SELECT SchemaID FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_forms jf WHERE FormPrefix = CONCAT('CSTF_STANDARD_', #{StoredFormSchema} ,'_FORM') ) LIMIT 1;
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();
